ch0148_41_matsuba/0101_0701_02_10: I hope today will be full of things for you to learn.
ch0148_41_matsuba/7101_0701_01_10:
My Gym is in Ecruteak City, which has a lot of
history.
ch0148_41_matsuba/7101_0701_02_10:
There’s a lot I can tell you about—whether it’s old
tales or Johto’s Legendary Pokémon!
ch0148_41_matsuba/7101_0701_03_10:
If I could get all my students interested in Johto
history, I’d be happy!
ch0148_41_matsuba/7102_0701_01_10:
I wonder if I don’t look like a teacher in
these clothes.
ch0148_41_matsuba/7102_0701_02_10: But if I wore a suit, it’d be too formal.
ch0148_41_matsuba/7102_0701_03_10:
I want my students to relax while they’re in
my class!
ch0148_41_matsuba/7103_0701_01_10:
Come to me if anything mysterious happens around
the school.
ch0148_41_matsuba/7103_0701_02_10:
After all, in places where people gather,
you’re bound to find other beings, too.
ch0148_41_matsuba/7104_0701_01_10: The world is more than what your eyes can see...
ch0148_41_matsuba/7104_0701_02_10: That’s something I’d like to teach all my students.
ch0148_41_matsuba/7104_0701_03_10:
The tough part is explaining something you
can’t see.
ch0148_41_matsuba/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! How are you liking
my classes?
ch0148_41_matsuba/7105_0701_02_10: Huh? You say they’re the best?
ch0148_41_matsuba/7105_0701_03_10:
*chuckle*
You sure know how to make me smile!
ch0148_41_matsuba/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! I have something for you.
ch0148_41_matsuba/1701_0702_01_10: I expect a report on that by our next class.
ch0148_41_matsuba/1701_0702_02_10: Just kidding! Do what you like with it.
ch0148_41_matsuba/2501_0701_01_10:
I feel like as a teacher, I can take advantage of
my experience as a Gym Leader.
ch0148_41_matsuba/2501_0701_02_10:
After all, both involve teaching or giving people
guidance.
ch0148_41_matsuba/2501_0702_01_10: I wanted to ask you something...
ch0148_41_matsuba/2501_0702_02_10:
If you were to take my class, what sort of things
would you want to learn about?
ch0148_41_matsuba/2501_0702_03_10: I’ve been thinking a lot about what I should teach.
ch0148_41_matsuba/2501_0702_04_10: So I wanted to get your thoughts!
ch0148_41_matsuba/2511_0701_01_10:
If what I teach could prove even just a little useful
to people, I’d be happy.
ch0148_41_matsuba/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s a teacher’s job to open their students’ futures
to new possibilities.
ch0148_41_matsuba/2511_0702_01_10: There’s one thing I want you to remember.
ch0148_41_matsuba/2511_0702_02_10: No matter past failures, the future’s always new!
ch0148_41_matsuba/2511_0702_03_10:
Even if our efforts aren’t always rewarded,
it’s not all for nothing.
ch0148_41_matsuba/2511_0702_04_10:
I believe your future will shine in a rainbow
of colors!
ch0148_41_matsuba/3001_0701_01_10:
Ecruteak City’s famous for the Bell Tower.
What would Pasio’s signature landmark be?
There are so many to choose from...
ch0148_41_matsuba/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio is definitely lively, but I prefer the vibe in
Ecruteak City a bit more.
ch0148_41_matsuba/3005_0701_01_10:
My partner Pokémon and I are more active at
night, but don’t push yourself to keep up with us
if you’re tired, all right?
